Package BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors.SensorHelpers

Class SensorDirectionWrapper

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors.SensorHelpers.SensorDirectionWrapper
public class SensorDirectionWrapper extends Object
A wrapper class for managing the direction of a sensor. This class handles the inversion of sensor direction and allows conversion between boolean and `SensorDirectionValue` representations.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    boolean
    isInverted
    Internal state representing whether the sensor is inverted.

  • Field Details

    • isInverted

      public boolean isInverted
      Internal state representing whether the sensor is inverted.

  • Constructor Details

    • SensorDirectionWrapper

      public SensorDirectionWrapper(boolean mode)
      Constructor to initialize the sensor direction wrapper with a boolean mode.
      Parameters:
      mode - A boolean value representing the inversion state of the sensor. `true` means the sensor is inverted, `false` means it is not.

    • SensorDirectionWrapper

      public SensorDirectionWrapper(SensorDirectionValue mode)
      Constructor to initialize the sensor direction wrapper with a `SensorDirectionValue` mode.
      Parameters:
      mode - A `SensorDirectionValue` representing the sensor direction. If the mode is `Clockwise_Positive`, the sensor will be considered inverted.

  • Method Details

    • asSensorDirectionValue

      public SensorDirectionValue asSensorDirectionValue()
      Returns the sensor direction as a `SensorDirectionValue`.
      Returns:
      A `SensorDirectionValue` that represents the sensor direction. Returns `Clockwise_Positive` if inverted, `CounterClockwise_Positive` otherwise.

    • asBoolean

      public boolean asBoolean()
      Returns the sensor direction as a boolean value.
      Returns:
      `true` if the sensor is inverted, `false` otherwise.
